content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I recall that you commanded me to google "language learning resources AND travel guides". Your computer returned information from the Morale, Welfare and Recreation Digital Library website, which includes Mango Languages, PressReader, and Kanopy as language learning and travel resources. The website also provides access to e-books, audiobooks, movies, academic support, test prep, professional development, and career transition resources. Links to the website and related military resources are provided. Your latest command to your computer to google "language learning resources AND travel guides" returned a list of websites, including militaryonesource.mil and theintrepidguide.com, which offer language learning and travel resources.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.militaryonesource.mil/resources/external/morale-welfare-and-recreation-digital-library/", "question": "What are some language learning and travel resources available on this website?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Mango Languages, PressReader, and Kanopy are some of the language learning and travel resources available on the Morale, Welfare and Recreation Digital Library website. The website also provides free access to a variety of resources, including e-books, audiobooks, movies, academic support, test prep, professional development, and career transition. \n \n Links: ['\\n            Install\\n         (https://www.militaryonesource.mil/resources/external/morale-welfare-and-recreation-digital-library/#apptarget)', 'Department of Defense (https://www.defense.gov/)', 'Department of Defense (https://www.defense.gov/)', '  Military OneSource   Military OneSource (https://www.militaryonesource.mil/)', 'About Us (https://www.militaryonesource.mil/about-us)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "language learning resources AND travel guides"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.militaryonesource.mil/resources/external/morale-welfare-and-recreation-digital-library/", "https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/", "https://www.anacorteswa.gov/232/Language-Learning-Travel", "https://www.theintrepidguide.com/", "https://libguides.princeton.edu/c.php?g=986992&p=9479693", "https://libguides.northwestern.edu/languages", "https://languagelearningathome.com/blog/2019/11/8/2019-holiday-gift-guide-for-little-language-learners-and-travel-lovers", "https://thetraveltester.com/culture/language-learning/"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/", "question": "What are some language learning resources available on this website?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The website offers a variety of language learning resources, including apps and tools such as Mondly, italki, uTalk, Glossika, Busuu, Babbel, LingQ, Duolingo, and Memrise. It also offers courses such as Michel Thomas, Uncovered Beginner Courses by Olly Richards, and Bite-Size Immersive Audio Courses by Actual Fluency, as well as language exchange mobile app Tandem and popular podcast Coffee Break Languages. The website also provides reviews of language learning tools and apps, travel phrase guides, and dictionaries. \n \n Links: ['Home (https://www.theintrepidguide.com)', 'Travel Guides (https://www.theintrepidguide.com/destinations/)', 'Australia (https://www.theintrepidguide.com/destinations/oceania/australia/)', 'Austria (https://www.theintrepidguide.com/destinations/europe/austria/)', 'Belgium (https://www.theintrepidguide.com/destinations/europe/belgium/)']"}]
"""
